title: Natsuzuma
synopsis: Sometimes, even passionate relationships eventually turn into a domestic dead end. It is important not to let this happen and find time for your other half. Yumiko's husband did not understand this simple truth, so he preferred other things to do, just not to go on vacation with his family. But don't worry. There are guys who will not allow a married woman to be bored alone. Gentlemen organize a program for her, where in the mornings Yumiko is roasted by the hot sun, and at night...
